intent_atoms.description: Provide lenient-vs-strict CLI benchmarking for LargeFileBenchmarkTests to capture average duration and RSS deltas per mode.
The benchmark must report average duration and RSS deltas for each mode within the test suite.
Tolerant-mode overhead budgets are enforced: runtime ≤1.2× of baseline and RSS increase ≤50 MiB, verified by XCTest assertions.
Benchmark results must show runtime overhead ≤1.049× and RSS increase ≤0.01 MiB for the archived Linux metrics.
Introduce PerformanceBenchmarkConfiguration to hold tolerant-mode budgets and enforce them via XCTest assertions.

functional_units.name: LargeFileBenchmarkTests
functional_units.description: CLI benchmarking for lenient vs strict modes, capturing average duration and RSS deltas

functional_units.name: PerformanceBenchmarkConfiguration
functional_units.description: Defines tolerant-mode overhead budgets (runtime multiplier and RSS increase) and enforces them via XCTest assertions

functional_units.name: LargeFileBenchmarkFixture

functional_units.name: ISOINSPECTOR_BENCHMARK_PAYLOAD_BYTES environment variable
functional_units.description: Specifies the size of the reference payload for benchmarking (e.g., 1 GiB)
